channel.title: Teamgearedup on LouderVoice Customer Reviews
channel.description: Recent content in Teamgearedup on LouderVoice Customer Reviews

item.title: Another competition winner
item.description:
We closed the first phase of the reviews competition a few weeks ago but we were so blown away by the review by Alx Cahiz of the stunning Dervish Longboard that we had to give him a prize.

This wasnâ€™t just review of the week, I think it was review of the month! Looking forward to seeing what else he comes up with. It should also be said that TeamGearedUp is one of the best blogs out there about outdoor sports and activities.
